review: Suprisingly good food (both local and international). Good atmosphere and  great and fast staff (thanks Rasika for welcoming us so kindly!). We ended up having a great evening here and looking around we were not alone with this feeling :) Thank you Chill Cafe hope...to come back one d to come back one day!

Quite expensive by local standards. Carrot and ginger soup - no ginger and  very bland. Tiny bread roll but tasty. Strawberry milkshake which was supposed to include real strawberries. None apparent. Just strawberry ice cream. Waiter indifferent to complaint
The place is amazing, the decoration is wonderful, the food is delicious and the team is so friendly specialy Rasika who speak Spanish. I highly recommend this lovely place. Thank you so much
Nice fast service of Rasika; and good food (lots of options, also for vegans)  , open air seating under the roof, on the main street (expect it to be a bit laud)

We were warmly received by Vidal who rushed to find us a nice table on the upper terrace despite the full occupancy. Food was great, beer was awesome and mostly Vidal our waiter gave us an extraordinary service. Will go there again certainly.
The food is really good and the service is nice. Rasika did a great job in serving drinks and food. We can recommend this place.
Top place for a feed in Ella. Great food, great atmosphere and great service - especially Vidal!  Highly recommended.  You‚Äùll want the top floor tables overlooking the street - book ahead.

Rasika  thans for every thing.that was a great night.we where there at 20 th of march 2024  first day  of iranian new year called noutioz.we had a very good night with deliciouse food and drink.i recomend try the fish and the ella mojito.‚ù£Ô∏è‚úåüèæ

Thank you so much Cafe Chill !!! We had a surprised cake offered !!!  Excellent food & Great Drinks 
The staff was amazing and friendly 
Especially Rasika did a great service for us 

Thank you üòä

Amazing food and good coctails. Nice place to chill ü§™
Rasika was very good waiter. Thank You very much for a good evening.

All good! Great food,great service:))
Waiter RASKILA was very friendly
Bring beer in 1 minute :) no long waitting time
Also good location and good music
Lovely environment and very welcoming servers. Well done to Rasika - always smiling :) food is great, they have very good european dishes which was surprising!
RANJITH was amazing, great bar, great food and awesome atmosphere.  Sport was on the screen, very cool bar men pasi very cool guys.

Great place! The service was great- Roma gave us the best service, he was nice, helpful, friendly and professional!
A lot of gluten free options including gluten free bread

Great spot for food - especially if you crave some western foods after having curry for a long time! ;)
The architecture of the place was nice and reminded me a lot of the restaurants in Bali. Prices are more western than typical Sri Lankan....So be prepared.

The service was impeccable :) We had Rasika as a waiter and he was absolutely amazi So be prepared.

The service was impeccable :) We had Rasika as a waiter and he was absolutely amazing.
Amazing food, great customer service from Kumara, great live music - lovely experience would recommend on your trip in Ella
Great food and atmosphere. The kothu was very tasty and it was quick service for a large group.  Kumara our waiter was very friendly
Great place for live music and a British Indian curry. Arun, our waiter, is a G bless up! Come here xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo
We had a really good dinner here, with very nice live music to entertain us! Arun was giving us perfect service all evening!
Had the village chicken curry - lovely but spicy! Great atmosphere with music and lovely staff. We had Ayesh and he was so personable.
We were served by Ayesh who was extremely friendly and helpful, we spoke to him for a while and he even helped us with sorting out our broken phone! The food was delicious and it had a great vibe.
Wonderful  restaurant with live music -and delicious food! Ayesh, our waiter, was wery friendly and polite! 5 stars from us!
Great food, good service (thanks Ayesh!!), it was a cool reprieve from the heat - sitting upstairs with the breeze. We'll definitely be coming back here, the curry was delicious. Can highly recommend

It was a good experience. Ayesh , our waiter was well spoken and very welcoming and offered us very good service for which we are grateful. What‚Äôs special about his service is that I‚Äôd ordered a salt lassi (popular in India) . He served me...the drink and asked me to taste it to see if it was to my liking. This drink is made with unsweetened yoghurt however here in Ella, most of the yoghurt I‚Äôve come across is sweetened. He knew this , hence his suggestion. I needed a little more salt in the drink which was taken care of immediately. All the food we ordered was delicious and was served in  healthy porti the drink and asked me to taste it to see if it was to my liking. I needed a little more salt in the drink which was taken care of immediately. All the food we ordered was delicious and was served in  healthy portions

Our family had brunch and was served by Ayesh . He was absolutely amazing and very accommodating  Food was 9.5 out of 10.  So glad we picked this restaurant before going anywhere else. Definitely will come back when we in Ela again. Thanks again Ayesh!!!
Good food, friendly personal. Special mr. Saman. He is very Freindly and have a good behavior. Live music is allso very good.
Great food, great vibe and fun music with excellent service. Gishan was an exceptional waiter. Upstairs is the best. Enjoy.

Braboda was out server and he was amazing. The food was beyond excellent and there was a live band playing that really added to the experience. There is a large menu and everything on it is amazing and the drinks are great! I highly recommend...this restaurant for a good time and it‚Äôs right in Ella town so it‚Äôs in a great place to go exploring afte this restaurant for a good time and it‚Äôs right in Ella town so it‚Äôs in a great place to go exploring after .
Best quality foods in Ella town...staff is also friendly and service is also good. Very nice aesthetic and view is supper nice with live music.
